::Dark Rodimus::
=A0
Rodimus opens up a access hatch on his left wrist. He =
pulls out two wires and connects to some ports on the pods control panel.
=
=A0
Rodimus: I've connected to the pod. You can start downloading through m=
y systems across the commlink. I think it'll work as a decent datalink.
